subject: Incorrect charge on my invoice
content: Hi, my name is John Smith and I was charged twice for my subscription this month. I noticed on my invoice that order #45678 appears twice. This is an unauthorized charge and I would like a refund immediately. My account balance should only show one payment of $29.99, not two. Please review my billing statement and process the refund.

subject: Help with account setup
content: Hello, I need assistance setting up my new account. I can't figure out how to configure the settings properly and the tutorial doesn't cover my specific use case. Can you help me understand how to enable the advanced features? I'm confused about the workflow and need some guidance. My name is Sarah Miller.

subject: Application crashes on startup
content: Our application crashes every time we try to launch it after the latest update. The error message says 'Fatal exception in module X' and then it fails completely. This is a critical bug that's preventing our entire team from working. We need this fixed urgently as it's not working at all and is completely broken. Error code: ERR_12345

subject: Feature request: Dark mode support
content: Hello, I would like to suggest adding dark mode support to your application. Many users including myself prefer dark themes for better eye comfort during extended use. This enhancement would be a great addition and I believe it would improve the user experience significantly. Would you consider implementing this feature in a future release? It would be wonderful if you could add support for this functionality.

subject: Question about payment methods
content: Hi I have a question about the accepted payment methods. Do you accept wire transfers for annual subscriptions? Our company policy requires invoice-based billing with NET-30 payment terms. Can we set this up for our account?

subject: Not sure about something
content: I have an issue but I'm not entirely clear what category it falls into. Sometimes the thing works and sometimes it doesn't. Could you look into this?

subject: Bug: Data export feature malfunction
content: Hi, there's a defect in the data export feature. When I try to export large datasets, the system generates corrupted files. This malfunction occurs consistently with files over 1GB. The export fails and produces incorrect data. This bug needs to be fixed as we rely on data exports for our reports.

subject: Refund request for unused subscription
content: Dear support team, I would like to request a refund for my annual subscription. My name is Lisa Wong and I purchased the premium plan (order #78901) three months ago, but due to budget constraints, we can no longer use the service. According to your refund policy, we should be eligible for a proactive refund of the unused portion. Please process the credit back to my account.
